== Ala (CT) (627880) ==

Ala (CT) is a town in the [[Kodungallur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 5.45 sq. km. and harbouring 2581 households with total population of 10493 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 44 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 295 km. Male population is 4962 and female population is 5531. Scheduled Caste population is 1429 and Scheduled Tribes population is 8. Census Location Code of the town is 627880<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 44 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 25 km.
